Name: Contessa
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As Negroni -style cocktails go, the vibrant orange-amber Contessa is nudging being on the sweet side (but no less likeable for it).
History: Adapted from a recipe attributed to John Gertsen at Drink bar in Boston, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Contessa contains 171 calories
